name: NEXEH WATER TREATMENT CENTER
description: Lord Oekir's water treatment center. : His Royal Army uses Nexeh to convert : sludge to drinkable water. : There are plans to expand production : in the southern cave. The room west of : the cave houses a TR209 PowerPlant. : -<SAFETY NOTICE>- : Be careful in the Water Flow Station. : Falling into one of the W.F.C wells will : NOT be very heathly. : -<THANK YOU>-
